title: Mahama Govt Blows $10 Million On Presidential Diaries  Nana Addo Alleges
text: Nana Addo Danquah Akufo-Addo, flagbearer of the opposition New Patriotic Party ( NPP ), has alleged that the Mahama-led government spent $ 10 million on printing presidential diaries. This issue according to him, is sad because Ghanaians on a
